title: Cupid's complaint
creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Australian Road Safety Council
brief_description: A rather solidly-built Cupid complains to his mother that he had picked out a beautifully matched couple and was bringing them together, but now, as a result of the girl not giving hand signals and the young man speeding, they have crashed into one another’s cars and are furious with each other.
creator_credit_for_label: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Australian Road Safety Council
